structure.unit: Chapter 33B AREAS OF CRITICAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERN

text.section: Notwithstanding anything in (Zoning Code) of the Code of Metropolitan Miami-Dade County to the contrary, applications for variances to the provisions of this division must comply with the provisions of (general standards for conditional use) of this division. The cumulative and/or secondary or induced impacts from a proliferation of the proposed development must also comply with the provisions of of this division.
